title: Asoka Thilakaratne case: Transport of bank vault millions: CID seizes auctioned Army Defender
content: The Criminal Investigations Department (CID) conducting investigations into the recovery of Rs 75 million made up of several foreign currency denominations found in four vaults at a private bank belonging to Asoka Thilakaratne, had taken into custody a black Defender Jeep which is alleged to have brought the money to the bank.
